mapper.select: SELECT A.fid, A.fname, A.price, A.measurement, A.has_sold, A.introduce, A.img, B.admin_name AS createUser, C.admin_name AS updateUser FROM food A INNER JOIN admin B ON A.create_user = B.uuid LEFT JOIN admin C ON A.update_user = C.uuid WHERE A.is_del = 0 AND A.fid = #{fid}
